title: Lords of the realm 1 font id required
content:
Hello, i was wondering what font (or fonts, look like 2 separate) were used in this particular scroll image?  
 ![]()https://www.dropbox.com/s/hnpm34dgrtc3en4/wtFont2.png

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wtFont2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019024052/http:/typophile.com/files/wtFont2.png) | 67.52 KB |
author: smoke_th

comments.content:
This is probably **[Black Chancery](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019024052/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=BlackChancery%20-%20Regular&fid=753833d2833e9f73b56cffae357cf95f&fsize=60&text=Hear%20ye!%20Hear%20ye!%20Our%20lord%20and%20master..%20All%20hail%20the%20Baron&wrap=2)** a public domain font by Doug Miles

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019024052/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
